name: Agent Whobbles
description:
On New Years Eve Agent Whobbles tries to survive waves of evil Blobs that try to kill him. He can only defend himself with a confetti cannon, some firecrackers and fireworks from the shop nearby. 

WASD - Moving

LEFTCLICK - Shoot

E - Buy Item

SPACE - Next Wave

MOUSEWHEEL - Change Weapon

Delopement: Sosnain and Christian

Visuals: Sosnain

Music: AdhesiveWombat: https://www.youtube.com/c/AdhesiveWombat
